name: Conky
description: Conky is a system monitor of desktop environment. It not only can monitor system status, network status and other parameters, but also can customize function modules and interfaces to configure different Conky interfaces.

zh_CN.description: Conky是一个桌面环境的系统监视软件，它可以在桌面上监控系统运行状态、网络状态等参数，同时还可以自定义功能模块和界面来配置不同的Conky显示界面。
zh_CN.name: Conky
